analysis.description:
ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#156-164) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(weiValue) (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#163-164)

ZiberToken (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#21-310) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#165-177)

ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#156-164) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- weiValue == 0
weiRefunded in ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#162) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in ZiberToken.claim_ico (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#231-265):
	External calls:
	- token.proxyPayment.value(this.balance - ico)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#245-246)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- extra_time_bought (/unique_chucks/22/0xb8d24ac55866236b2c7b8fb046ca110d488fba02.sol#255-256)
